com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction

Interface SegmentationDefinitionBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SegmentationDefinitionBuilderImpl

    public interface SegmentationDefinitionBuilder
    The SegmentationDefinitionBuilder builds a segmentation definition which is used to extract text from XML documents. The segmentation definition defines which text elements are included or excluded before sending the text to the Acrolinx Server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder addAdvancedProperty(String propertyName, String value)
      Adds a possibility to add new CSD profile properties without adapting the SegmentationDefinitionBuilder.
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder addBreakLevelMode(String tagName, SegmentationDefinition.BreakLevel breakLevel)
      Adds a break level for the given tag name.
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder addInclusionMode(String tagName, SegmentationDefinition.InclusionMode inclusionMode)
      Adds an inclusion mode for the given tag name.
      SegmentationDefinition build()
      Builds the segmentation definition with the previous
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder setAttributesToExtract(String attributesToExtract)
      Sets the attributes which should be extracted from the XML document.
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder setCsdName(String csdName)
      Sets the name of the context segmentation definition (CSD).
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder setEntityConversionFilePath(String entityConversionFilePath)
      Sets the entity conversion file path.
      SegmentationDefinitionBuilder setInputType(String inputType)
      Sets the input type.

    • Method Detail

      • addInclusionMode

        SegmentationDefinitionBuilder addInclusionMode(String tagName,
                                             SegmentationDefinition.InclusionMode inclusionMode)
        Adds an inclusion mode for the given tag name.
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name (without brackets), e.g. myelement
        inclusionMode - the inclusion mode for the given element name, e.g. INCLUSION
        Returns:
        same instance of segmentation definition builder

      • addBreakLevelMode

        SegmentationDefinitionBuilder addBreakLevelMode(String tagName,
                                              SegmentationDefinition.BreakLevel breakLevel)
        Adds a break level for the given tag name.
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name (without brackets), e.g. myelement
        breakLevel - the break level for the given element name, e.g. SENTENCE
        Returns:
        same instance of segmentation definition builder

      • build

        SegmentationDefinition build()
        Builds the segmentation definition with the previous

      • setAttributesToExtract

        SegmentationDefinitionBuilder setAttributesToExtract(String attributesToExtract)
        Sets the attributes which should be extracted from the XML document.
        Parameters:
        attributesToExtract - the attributes to extract as comma-separated list, e.g "meta.content#name=description,img.alt"
        Returns:
        same instance of segmentation definition builder

      • setInputType

        SegmentationDefinitionBuilder setInputType(String inputType)
        Sets the input type. The default value is "XML".
        Parameters:
        inputType - the input type
        Returns:
        same instance of segmentation definition builder
